data1.Desc: The Plesk application doesn’t work after deployment from the Marketplace
The CDN add-ons cost on the reselling platforms is calculated based on the parent installation currency
Some PHP-based applications in the Marketplace utilize outdated PHP engine versions
Only part of the error text is displayed in the email when installing the Let’s Encrypt add-on with an incorrect domain name
The Let’s Encrypt add-on installation fails if any active yum repo is unavailable
The Let’s Encrypt add-on cannot be installed on the load balancer layer if the settings-custom config is used
Incorrect regex expression for generating certificates with the Let’s Encrypt add-on
Unhandled error when updating the Let’s Encrypt add-on with incorrect domain configured
SSL chain issue after installing the Let’s Encrypt add-on for the NGINX load balancer
An error occurs when trying to install the Minio application from the Marketplace
The mysqld process is running by default on the Apache PHP stacks
Apache PHP containers become inaccessible after redeployment from the 8th to 7th PHP version
Insufficient permissions to run the “nginx -t” command on the NGINX-based containers
An error occurs during the Ruby-based stacks redeployment
The Maven build node is installed with the GraalVM Java engine when the OpenJDK 8 one is selected
Typo in the resource name in the ssl.upstreams.inc configuration file on the NGINX load balancer
The Cyclos 4 Cluster application becomes inaccessible in a few minutes after deployment from the Marketplace
The GitBlit application is inaccessible after deployment from the Marketplace
The Alfresco application is inaccessible after deployment from the Marketplace
The xWiki application is inaccessible after deployment from the Marketplace
The Liferay application is inaccessible after deployment from the Marketplace
An error occurs when trying to install the OpenCMS application from the Marketplace

data2.Desc: Incorrect JSON response for the 'permission denied' error in the container’s file manager
An error occurs when trying to fetch Volumes for custom Docker containers with credentials
An error occurs when trying to open the Custom tab of the topology wizard as a collaborator
The Tomcat auto-cluster cannot be created due to incorrect firewall rules
